name: Digital Crate
tagline: Web designer, developer with a passion for great
description: Digital Crate Limited is made up from a small group of creative professionals based in Sussex intent on providing website design and development to the highest standard. Our core services include Website Design and Development, SEO Services, Web Analytics and reliable, powerful Web Hosting. So if you require a new website or need some feedback or advice on your current site, then our lovely people would love to talk to your lovely people.
